wekatweeter.tools
Class PreProcessor

java.lang.Object
  wekatweeter.tools.PreProcessor

public class PreProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the functionality of processing data before it is submitted to Weka for data classification.

Performs the following preprocessing:

  • Data conversion to lower case.
  • Stopword removal.
  • Word stemming.
  • Removal of links, numerals and special characters.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Muhammad Sajawal Javaid

preprocess

public java.lang.String preprocess(java.lang.String input,
                                   java.lang.String category)
Public interface for the PreProcessor class. Can be called to perform preprocessing on the document corpus.

Parameters:
input - A document string in the corpus.
category - The category classification of the document.
Returns:
The processed document string.

stem

private java.lang.String stem(java.lang.String input)
Uses the SnowballStemmer library that is packaged with Weka to perform stemming on documents in the corpus.

Parameters:
input - A document string in the corpus.
Returns:
Stemmed document string.

removeStopwords

private java.lang.String removeStopwords(java.lang.String input,

Uses the Stopwrods class that is packaged with Weka to remove stopwords from documents in the corpus.

Parameters:
input - A document string in the corpus.
Returns:
The input string stripped of stopwords.
